arguments.text:
Dress‑Code Policy (Policy-DC-2023)

1. Purpose
All employees must present a professional appearance that reflects the company brand.

2. General Guidelines
- Business attire required on client‑facing days.
- Casual attire (jeans, t‑shirts) allowed on internal days after 10 AM.

3. Prohibited Items
- Clothing with offensive language or graphics.
- Open sandals in production areas.

4. Enforcement
Violations may result in a verbal warning, followed by written notice if repeated.

Remote‑Work Policy (Policy-RW-2023)

1. Scope
All full‑time employees may work remotely up to 3 days per week.

2. Eligibility
- Must have prior manager approval.
- Must have a secure home network.

3. Work Hours
- Core hours: 10 AM‑4 PM.
- Employees must be reachable via Teams during core hours.

4. Data Security
- Use VPN for all company resources.
- Store confidential files on encrypted company drives only.

5. Equipment
- Company‑provided laptop must be used; no personal devices for confidential work.

6. Performance Monitoring
- Managers will conduct weekly check‑ins and monthly productivity reviews.
